titleStmt.title: Historical essaies & observations, proving Gods especial providence over the English monarchy and more particularly over that family which enjoys the same / by H. Puleston ...
titleStmt.author: Puleston, Hamlet, 1632-1662.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the author, and are to be sold by Ric. Davis ...,

notesStmt.note: A reissue of sheets B-F (p. 1-40) of Monarchicae britannicae singularis protectio. London, 1661.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
